languages.text: "Маршал Грегорас Стракс. Ввиду ваших предыдущих действий и достижений, я лишаю вас права на казнь. Вы приговариваетесь к отбыванию наказания трудом. Я назначаю вас верховным надзирателем мира Веабос-6. Там вы и останетесь до конца жизни".

"Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."
languages.original_text: "Маршал Грегорас Стракс. Ввиду ваших предыдущих действий и достижений, я лишаю вас права на казнь. Вы приговариваетесь к отбыванию наказания трудом. Я назначаю вас верховным надзирателем мира Веабос-6. Там вы и останетесь до конца жизни".

traits.locale_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account the record of your past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

"Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account the record of your past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

"Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

"Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

languages.text: "Marschall Gregoras Strachs, unter Berücksichtigung Eurer früheren Erfolge verweigere ich Euch hiermit die Exekution und wandle Eure Strafe in Arbeit um. Ich ernenne Euch zum obersten Aufseher der Welt Vheabos-VI. Dort werdet Ihr den Rest Eures Lebens verbringen."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: "Marschall Gregoras Strachs, unter Berücksichtigung Eurer früheren Erfolge verweigere ich Euch hiermit die Exekution und wandle Eure Strafe in Arbeit um. Ich ernenne Euch zum obersten Aufseher der Welt Vheabos-VI. Dort werdet Ihr den Rest Eures Lebens verbringen."

languages.text: « Maréchal Gregoras Strachs, compte tenu des hauts faits accomplis au cours de votre carrière, je refuse de vous exécuter et vous condamne plutôt à une sentence de travaux forcés. Je vous nomme surveillant en chef du monde Vhéabos VI. C'est là que vous passerez le restant de vos jours. »
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: « Maréchal Gregoras Strachs, compte tenu des hauts faits accomplis au cours de votre carrière, je refuse de vous exécuter et vous condamne plutôt à une sentence de travaux forcés. Je vous nomme surveillant en chef du monde Vhéabos VI. C'est là que vous passerez le restant de vos jours. »

languages.text: “格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，考虑到你过去的功绩，我不打算把你处以死刑，而是判你苦役。我在此任命你担任维博斯六号星的高阶监察员，你将会在那个世界度过余生。”
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: “格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，考虑到你过去的功绩，我不打算把你处以死刑，而是判你苦役。我在此任命你担任维博斯六号星的高阶监察员，你将会在那个世界度过余生。”

languages.text: «Mariscal Gregoras Strachs. Dada su hoja de servicio hasta la fecha, no se le ejecutará. En vez de eso, será castigado con trabajo. Le nombro sumo supervisor del planeta Vheabos VI, donde permanecerá el resto de su vida».
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: «Mariscal Gregoras Strachs. Dada su hoja de servicio hasta la fecha, no se le ejecutará. En vez de eso, será castigado con trabajo. Le nombro sumo supervisor del planeta Vheabos VI, donde permanecerá el resto de su vida».

languages.text: 「グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥、その過去の功績を考慮し、ここに処刑を取り下げ、代わりに苦役による処罰を言い渡す。君をヴィアボス・VIの上級監督官に任命する。そこで一生を終えるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: 「グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥、その過去の功績を考慮し、ここに処刑を取り下げ、代わりに苦役による処罰を言い渡す。君をヴィアボス・VIの上級監督官に任命する。そこで一生を終えるのだ」

languages.text: "Miralay Gregoras Strachs, geçmişte elde ettiğin sayısız muvaffakiyeti göz önünde bulundurarak idam talebini reddediyor ve bu vesileyle seni meşakkatli bir hizmetle cezalandırıyorum. Seni Vheabos VI gezegeninin gözetmeni olarak atıyorum. Ömrünün kalanını orada geçireceksin."
languages.original_text: "Marshal Gregoras Strachs, taking into account your record of past achievements, I hereby deny you your execution and instead sentence you to punishment by toil. I appoint you high overseer of the world Vheabos VI. That is where you will remain for the rest of your life."

traits.locale_text: "Miralay Gregoras Strachs, geçmişte elde ettiğin sayısız muvaffakiyeti göz önünde bulundurarak idam talebini reddediyor ve bu vesileyle seni meşakkatli bir hizmetle cezalandırıyorum. Seni Vheabos VI gezegeninin gözetmeni olarak atıyorum. Ömrünün kalanını orada geçireceksin."
